testcase.name: User creates a HTTP X source
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open the site "/login"✅ And I log in with "enterprise" account✅ And I visit the url "/directory"✅ When I add a source of type "HTTP" with name "Src_http"✅ Then I expect to be in the "Src_http" page

testcase.name: User creates a cloud destination of type Amplitude and connects to HTTP X source
testcase.system-out: ✅ And I visit the url "/directory"✅ And I add a destination of type "Amplitude" with name "Dest_amp", connected to source with name "Src_http"

testcase.name: User deletes connection
testcase.system-out: ✅ When I navigate to source "Src_http"✅ And I disconnect destination "Dest_amp" from source

testcase.name: User deletes destination
testcase.system-out: ✅ And I navigate to destination "Dest_amp"✅ And I delete the current destination✅ Then I expect to be in the "Destinations" page

testcase.name: User deletes source
testcase.system-out: ✅ When I navigate to source "Src_http"✅ And I delete the current source✅ Then I expect to be in the "Sources" page
